Why volunteer? Brigade Congress Live Show 🎤

Nov 10, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • volunteer
  • codeforamerica
  • brigade

Listen in with us for a conversation about the motivations and constraints involved with volunteering in civic tech! We’re joined by Jill Bjers, Nehemiah Dacres, Marianne Miranda, and Matt Zagaja for a live show that happened during the 2021 Code for America Brigade Congress.
